description:
Time to test your bike's speed on the highway! Get ready now kick, punch, attack and kill your bike rivals. Don't just get your hands dirty while fighting with hands have you are now equipped with heavy armor and missiles to blow up your enemies.

Dominate the road traffic and takedown your rivals on this endless highway and experience the thrill of racing in 3D with this Bike Racing Game for free.

The hyper addictive and ultra fast gameplay is divided into 2 modes: one way endless racing and two way endless racing. Choose your bike wisely and race through 4 different maps. The game is not just about bringing down your rivals by hitting or blowing up their vehicles but once you are racing endlessly on the track you also get a chance to perform stunts and earn some extra bucks. So this game is a combined package of bike racing, and performing stuns on bikes too.

Get your bike engine started to race in 4 different parts of the world.
• Bay view with green trees, plants and countryside landscape;
• Wild west with deserts;
• Tunnel side which gives amazing night racing experience;
• Small town with tine houses and yards.

So in a nutshell you got to get on your fast bike race through the traffic on the highway , dodge and dominate the oncoming vehicles and your rivals. Blow up your competitors with missiles and experience the race of death.

Race on !!! Don't be left behind drive as and race as fast as you can , the more faster you ride your bike, the more the overtakes you make of the cars and oncoming traffic the more extra points you get. But you need to avoid collisions with traffic on speed..

Ammo and Missiles are not that easy to get, they are laid on the endless racing track you got to collect them at right time to blow up other players. The more the destruction on the road , the more the road rage , the more the score.

To perform on speed bike racing you can choose from the following bikes:

1. Highway Free Rider
2. Super Bikes
3. Motor Bikes

Highway Bike Racing Game Features:

• 4 super fast racing bikes to choose from;
• 4 environments to choose;
• 2 game modes – one-way endless racing and two way endless racing;
• Takedown traffic on the highway
• Missiles, tons of missiles! Shoot the target and explode everything around;
- Upgrade your bikes and get them ready for war
• The game play is simple and very challenging;
• The game is free to download and can also be played without internet
- Best Bike Simulator Game made for serious racing game lovers
- Will make you remember the classic game of racing Road Rash
- Get ready to perform dangerous stunts.

Download the best bike racing game now !!
